name: SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #11
description: The S.A.N.W.S office or offices in Lubbock and/or Texarkana have issued a SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #11 at 10:04PM EST. Primary threats to expect include large hail and wind gusts up to 80MPH, and even a tornado or two. Impact: expect damage to vehicles, homes, powerlines, outdoor objects, and outdoor animals. This SVR THUNDERSTORM WATCH #11 will expire at 1:25PM EST on the 2nd.
